content: @Aman Arora remind me whatever happened with the material you all prepared regarding migrations and the RFC 2229 blog post?
I should've probably still opened the PR while I finish out the profile

For the content that needs to go in the Rust reference should that go in the closure type seciton or new page?
https://doc.rust-lang.org/reference/types/closure.html

@nikomatsakis Before I open a PR on rust-lang for the disjoint capture blog post, I wanted to double check whether I am creating the file in the right location. If I understand correctly I should be adding a file here: https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/tree/master/posts

yes, if it's for the main blog (wide general audience), and similarly within the "inside-rust" folder if it's a post dedicated to the "inside rust" blog (the more narrow audience of people following things that are more "internal")
here's an example PR for the main blog https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/pull/869
